shouldMatch: Configuration references Azure managed identity for MariaDB authentication.
Password property for MariaDB is removed from configuration.
JDBC connection string does not contain password segment.
Managed identity name is present in configuration.
Passwordless authentication is enabled for MariaDB connection.
shouldNotMatch: Configuration uses hardcoded password for MariaDB.
JDBC connection string contains password segment.
No managed identity name found in configuration.
Password property is still present for MariaDB authentication.
